author: James Joyce
text: Dear Miss Weaver: Here is U2 MS and typescript. Please let me know what you think of it, when read? The Dial proposed to delete one third of Yabcd! Lewis, it seems, has been to Paris and asked for the MS an is coming here as he wants to see me. ‘And I have done with you too, Mrs Delta’—for the moment. She will babble anon. With kindest regards sincerely yours James Joyce
